channel.title: Need Help Making Server Online
channel.description:
hey, i have a server and iv'e worked on it for a while and i don't know how to make it online.
i made a no-ip and everything...
and i attemped to portforward my router and i was wondering if someone would teamviewer me and show me how to do everything...thanks for reading -Sheathedude

item.title: Need Help Making Server Online
item.dc:creator: @oldschool-scape oldschool-scape
item.description:
@oldschool-scape wrote:

[quote=“ultimatepkvillage, post:3, topic:424032”]^^ utorrent fails it not even use for portforwarding its for downloading (torrent files) ill help you on teamviewer pm me
[size=8pt]
Some people in this community are silly[/size][/quote]

Well sir, i disagree it kept 110+ ppl easy up without lagg

its as good as ur own Internet and pc is.

item.title: Need Help Making Server Online
item.dc:creator: @oldschool-scape oldschool-scape
item.description:
@oldschool-scape wrote:

1- download utorrent

2- set client and source to ur IP

3- Open no-ip DUC

4- Open source

5- Open utorrent

6- Set port on utorrent

7- Close Source. and restart it

8- DONE!

Read full topic
